name: The Black Swordsman (Biim)
description:
This game is a tribute to Kentaro Miura (11/07/1966 - 06/05/2021), creator of Berserk.

"His manga has contributed to defining what I am and my tastes.
I hope that this little fan game might help to keep his memory alive among his fans."
Simone Tropea

This fan game is free and shared as free entertainment only, its use is forbidden for any type of economic advantages.

WARNING:
This game has FLASHING EFFECTS.

You can disable and enable the effect pressing the 'L' Key on the keyboard.

You can also increase by 10% the volume pressing + or decresing pressing -

INPUT:
A or Left Key to move left
D or Right Key to move right
G or Spacebar to attack with the Sword

Gamepad/Joystick supported, press A button to attack with the Sword

Game still under development, new attacks will be added soon.

Press ENTER or A on the Gamepad to play the game.

Please leave a feedback or comment, I will really appreciate it.
Thank you!
